title: Video: Ramona Lisa – Dominic
content:
I was first introduced to Ramona Lisa, the solo project of Chairlift’s Caroline Polachek, a month or so ago via her off kilter electro ballad Backwards and Upwards.

Dominic, her most recent effort is a lot less whacky than the aforementioned track, but no less captivating. The synth backing lilts and chirps as Polacheck delivers a mesmerizing vocal performance while casually rowing around the Everglades, surrounded by alligators.

Watch the visuals for Dominic above and catch her debut album Arcadia released 29/4 via Terrible Records.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d46
